title: Red Bull 's number of cans sold worldwide 2011 to 2016
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of cans in billions. In total the number of data points it has is 6.
Overall Number of cans in billions has increased over the Year.
Number of cans in billions is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2012, and finally roughly constant from 2012 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2012.
The highest Number of cans in billions, of value 6.06 was reached at Year 2016
Minimum Number of cans in billions about 4.08 was reached at Year 2011
